content: additional notions * 1 styrofoam cone 6 tall x 3 base circumference painted white on base * 1 styrofoam cone 9 tall x 4 base circumference painted green on base * 1 styrofoam cone 12 tall x 4 base circumference painted red on base * 1 clear 3/8 crystal bead * 1 ½ green crystal bead * 1 ½ red crystal bead * 3 straight pins with white green and red beaded tops **you will need 1 ball each of 1360 aran/gold a and 6560 hunter/gold b and 2 balls of 9560 wine/gold c ** video tutorial 3 1 http //www redheart co uk/free-patterns/ruffle-fir-trees 2 http //www redheart de/free-patterns/geh%c3%a4kelte-tannenb%c3%a4ume 3 http //www redheart com/learn/videos/crochet-ruffle-fir-trees
